_description: Verses on the qualities that will lead one to heaven, preceding a copy of Isidore’s Consilia in English prose — four monorhyming phrases

HunHM744.Transcription:
Lownes and humylyteClennes and chastyteLove and
                    charyteMercy and Pyte
HunHM744.Note:
Followed by Latin, ‘Iste virtutes suprascripte ducunt tractari
                        viam ad celorum’ before beginning of English prose.
HunHM744.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 248.
Dutschke,  C. W. 
             Guide to Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts in the Huntington
                Library.
         2 vols. San Marino, CA: Huntington Library, 1989: 1.247.
